case.title: Tonight! Lez get together! - 29 ( Brooklyn)
case.text:
So I've got no plans late tonight. I'm just a 29 year old guy who is looking to hang with a sweet, fun, and intelligent woman.
Coffee, a movie, cuddle...
I'm open to ideas.
I am, sweet, college educated, attractive, and fun.
If you think you might be interested, send me a message!
